medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Two Plates of Kabuki Actors
marks: 2 poems (sentyu_) probably regarding plays or char o_ju (order made by) Ko_cho_ro_ Toyokuni ga
description: images of figures separated by pink border; figure at R wears a black kimono with yellow and blue characters and grey sleeves; figure at L wears multicolored geometric and floral print garments and gold hair ornaments; L2001.372.194-249 received bound together as a book
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
